import React from "react"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import BrandFour from "../../../components/brand/BrandFour"; import BrandThree from "../../../components/brand/BrandThree"; import FooterFour from "../../../components/footer/FooterFour"; import HeaderStudio from "../../../components/header/HeaderStudio"; import InstagramFeed from "../../../components/InstagramFeed"; import ServiceListFive from "../../../components/list/ServiceListFive"; import Resume from "../../../components/Resume"; import SocialTwo from "../../../components/social/SocialTwo"; import TestimonialThree from "../../../components/testimonial/TestimonialThree"; const avatar = "assets/img/about-me-main-image.jpg"; const AboutMe = () => { return (
